response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its worth and the potential it offers, we are offering it to you at a special price of $14,000. We understand that this might be a substantial investment, but we assure you that the quality and benefits provided by this product make it a worthwhile purchase. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 14000}
